title: F1 Scoreboard Plugin Configuration
description: Configuration schema for the F1 Scoreboard plugin - displays Formula 1 standings, race results, qualifying, practice, sprint results, upcoming races, and race calendar

enabled.title: Enabled
enabled.description: Enable or disable the F1 scoreboard plugin

display_duration.title: Display Duration
display_duration.description: Duration in seconds for the display controller to show each plugin mode before rotating

update_interval.title: Update Interval
update_interval.description: How often to fetch new data from APIs in seconds

favorite_team.title: Favorite Team
favorite_team.description: Favorite constructor/team ID (e.g., mclaren, ferrari, red_bull, mercedes, williams, aston_martin, alpine, haas, sauber, rb). This team will always be shown and highlighted in standings.

favorite_driver.title: Favorite Driver
favorite_driver.description: Favorite driver code (e.g., VER, NOR, PIA, LEC, SAI, HAM, RUS, ALO, STR). This driver will always be shown and highlighted in standings and results.

driver_standings.title: Driver Standings
driver_standings.description: Configuration for current driver championship standings

top_n.title: Top Drivers
top_n.description: Number of top drivers to show in standings

always_show_favorite.title: Always Show Favorite
always_show_favorite.description: Always include favorite driver even if outside top N

constructor_standings.title: Constructor Standings
constructor_standings.description: Configuration for current constructor championship standings

top_n.title: Top Constructors
top_n.description: Number of top constructors to show

always_show_favorite.title: Always Show Favorite
always_show_favorite.description: Always include favorite team even if outside top N

recent_races.title: Recent Race Results
recent_races.description: Configuration for recent Grand Prix results

enabled.title: Enabled
enabled.description: Show recent race results display mode

number_of_races.title: Number of Races
number_of_races.description: Number of recent races to show

top_finishers.title: Top Finishers
top_finishers.description: Number of top finishers to display per race

always_show_favorite.title: Always Show Favorite
always_show_favorite.description: Always include favorite driver in results even if outside top N finishers

upcoming.title: Upcoming Race
upcoming.description: Configuration for the next race weekend display

show_session_times.title: Show Session Times
show_session_times.description: Show qualifying and sprint session times in addition to race time

countdown_enabled.title: Countdown Timer
countdown_enabled.description: Show live countdown timer to next session

qualifying.title: Qualifying Results
qualifying.description: Configuration for most recent qualifying session breakdown

show_q1.title: Show Q1
show_q1.description: Show Q1 results (all 20 drivers, bottom 5 eliminated)

show_q2.title: Show Q2
show_q2.description: Show Q2 results (top 15 drivers, bottom 5 eliminated)

show_q3.title: Show Q3
show_q3.description: Show Q3 results (top 10 drivers, determines pole position)

show_gaps.title: Show Gaps
show_gaps.description: Show time differential to session leader

practice.title: Free Practice Results
practice.description: Configuration for free practice session standings

enabled.title: Enabled
enabled.description: Show free practice results display mode

sessions_to_show.title: Sessions to Show
sessions_to_show.description: Which free practice sessions to display

top_n.title: Top Drivers
top_n.description: Number of top drivers to show per practice session

sprint.title: Sprint Race Results
sprint.description: Configuration for sprint race results (not all race weekends have sprints)

enabled.title: Enabled
enabled.description: Show sprint race results display mode

top_finishers.title: Top Finishers
top_finishers.description: Number of top finishers to display

calendar.title: Race Calendar
calendar.description: Configuration for upcoming race schedule display

max_events.title: Max Events
max_events.description: Maximum number of upcoming race weekends to show

dynamic_duration.title: Dynamic Duration
dynamic_duration.description: Allow scrolling modes to run until their scroll cycle completes instead of using a fixed timer

enabled.title: Enabled
enabled.description: Enable dynamic duration for scrolling display modes

max_duration_seconds.title: Max Duration
max_duration_seconds.description: Maximum seconds before forcing rotation even if scroll is incomplete

game_card_width.title: Card Width
game_card_width.description: Width of each card in scroll mode (pixels). Default 128. Set lower on multi-panel chains to show more cards simultaneously.

scroll_speed.title: Scroll Speed
scroll_speed.description: Pixels per frame to scroll (frame-based mode)

scroll_delay.title: Scroll Delay
scroll_delay.description: Delay between scroll frames in seconds

customization.title: Display Customization
customization.description: Customize fonts for different text elements

header_text.title: Header Text
header_text.description: Font for section headers (GP names, session labels)

position_text.title: Position Numbers
position_text.description: Font for standings position numbers and driver codes

detail_text.title: Detail Text
detail_text.description: Font for points, times, gaps, and other details

small_text.title: Small Text
small_text.description: Font for secondary information (circuit name, location)
